descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# 🎮 Brief
Inspired by Orcs Must Die, Dungeon Rage is a fast-paced Rogue-lite action game. Begin your journey as a rookie knight armed with a humble axe, battling waves of enemies to unlock powerful weapons, ingenious traps, and game-changing buffs.

[media]

Each victory offers choices: weapons, buffs, or traps – what will you choose to outsmart the horde? Face colossal bosses with unpredictable attacks, where your strategy and skills will decide your fate.

[media]

Gear up, enter the dungeon, and craft traps that chain together for devastating results. Saving the princess? That’s just the beginning.

[media]

# 🎮 Objectives & Features
**🔥Cut through hordes and rescue the princess.**

**🔥Unlock and combine weapons, traps, and buffs to create unstoppable combos.**

**🔥Adapt to Rogue-lite challenges with ever-changing enemies and obstacles.**

**🔥Outsmart and outplay epic bosses with clever strategies.**

**🔥Discover bonus stages and unexpected rewards.**

**🔥Experiment with unique weapons and trap designs for explosive results.**

**🔥Uncover a gripping story of mystery and danger.**

[media]

# 🎮Story
Year 327, Kingdom of Sri: disaster strikes. The princess has been kidnapped by goblins!

As a rookie knight dreaming of an easy life, you’re sent on a rescue mission. But saving the princess is just the start – strange artifacts from another world have appeared, like a glowing rod...

What secrets lie within the dungeon’s shadows? Only your courage and strategy will reveal the truth.

[media]
